name: Revenge of Johny 5 (LowPolyGames)
description:
-----RE UPLOAD-----

This is a re-upload from John's personal account to the team account. Find the original here:

https://hellfire1997.itch.io/revenge-of-johny-5

With a theme of Surprisingly Spooky, we made a Revenge Of Johny 5. Team was John Weightman, Tim Weightman, Will Dixon and Luke Garside.  This was for CanJam 2018 at the University of Lincoln.

Navigate an abandoned lab, sneaking around a ruthless murdering robot and collecting parts of an EMP, putting an end to his rampage. Uncover the mystery behind what happened to the staff, and how they met their gruesome ends.

Controls:

          WASD - Move around

          Mouse - To look around & interact/escape robot when caught
